content: LeBron’s not on the MVP conversation due to a lot of factors, not only the fact that people grew tired of him. I guess he’s not leading the NBA in any statistical category, advanced or not. But everybody knows he’s more than capable of winning it all on his own. He’s the best player in the NBA, and the guys fighting for second best — Durant, Davis, Curry, Westbrook — are still miles away from him. I guess only Durant and Davis can dream of having the sort of impact LeBron has on both ends of the floor in a short span of time.
